timeline.bodyText:
can this occur after setting the file permissions?
At least on snap, this will fail because the root user in snap does not have CAP_FOWNER (which allows you to do chmod operations on files not owned by yourself)
timeline.author: rbattle

timeline.bodyText: Have you thought using Java BitSet to represent these? Then you can use the normal linux file permission bits(e.g. 777) to initialize them, which I think it's more readable.
